data.eml:eml: Description of a new species of the Central Palaearctic genus Margelana Staudinger (Lepidoptera: Noctuidae) from northeastern Iran

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Fibiger, Michael, Zahiri, Reza, Kononenko, Vladimir S. (2007): Description of a new species of the Central Palaearctic genus Margelana Staudinger (Lepidoptera: Noctuidae) from northeastern Iran. Zootaxa 1503: 13-19, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.177146
